segments.text: The tension in this kitchen scene is palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel a sense of impending disaster hanging in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues her mundane task, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so angry that she's not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already covering a significant portion of the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those children are going to cause a serious accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is clearly on the verge of toppling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why won't anyone notice what's happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout a warning to them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a ticking time bomb in this ordinary kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The disregard for safety is truly infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR
